tool.name: OGS: TIN2VTK
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'TIN2VTK'.
tool.command: if [ "$input_tin_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input_tin_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input_tin_file' '${$input_tin_file.element_identifier}'; fi; TIN2VTK --input-tin-file '$input_tin_file.element_identifier' --output-vtu-file output_1.vtu

param.name: input_tin_file
param.label: input tin file
param.help: Input (.tin). the input file containing the input TIN

tool.help: This tool runs the **TIN2VTK** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
